name: bookworm
description: An application created by a book lover (aka a bookworm), so that all book lovers can keep track of their private libraries in a fun and easy manner. It was created using the MERN stack: React for the FrontEnd, Node.js & Express.js for the BackEnd and MongoDB for the database.

scripts.setup-production: npm run install-client && npm run build-client && npm run install-server

author: Sofia Tachmatzidou
